name: Anthony Towns
cooked: I don’t think there’s much concern about invalid txs – you can trivially replace an individual invalid tx consuming X^2 units of CPU with X invalid txs each consuming X units of CPU, for the same total consumption?
topic_title: Draft BIP for OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY
topic_html_title: Draft BIP for OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY
raw: I don't think there's much concern about invalid txs -- you can trivially replace an individual invalid tx consuming X^2 units of CPU with X invalid txs each consuming X units of CPU, for the same total consumption?
